items.title: REI’s new CEO has a plan to turn around the beloved retailer—by going back to its roots

items.title: Instacart boss Fidji Simo was the first member of her family to graduate from high school. Sam Altman just carved out a brand-new ‘CEO’ role for her at OpenAI
items.description: Simo told Fortune the U.S. healthcare system is not well-suited to treat rare and complex diseases, which is where AI can make an impact.
